name: Impuissant
description:
Impuissant is a fun little game, my first proper one, where you have to protect a cell from the dangers of the lab. Someone hasn't cleaned the petri dish, so you'll have to go in under the microscope and using some new technology destroy all foes of the little cell you are tasked to protect!

Download when you are ready to embark on the quest of the Impuissant cell! How To Play:
  1. Click on the enemies to attack, they include the ones shown in the screenshots
  2. The cell in the middle is the one you are to protect
  3. Some enemies need to be clicked more than once
  4. Although some shouldn't be clicked at all
  5. Have fun!
